plot: A self indulgent, autobiographical docu-drama that chronicles the filmmaker's "struggle" with narrow minded authorities, critics, and personal tragedy.
title: Demônios e Maravilhas
plot_es: A self indulgent, autobiographical docu-drama that chronicles the filmmaker's "struggle" with narrow minded authorities, critics, and personal tragedy.
plot_en: A self indulgent, autobiographical docu-drama that chronicles the filmmaker's "struggle" with narrow minded authorities, critics, and personal tragedy.
